original_text: Reaiah the son of Shobal fathered Jahath, and Jahath fathered Ahumai and Lahad. These were the clans of the Zorathites.
korean_text: 소발의 아들 르아야는 야핫을 낳고 야핫은 아후매와 라핫을 낳았으니 이는 소라 사람의 종족이며

sentences.original_text: Reaiah the son of Shobal fathered Jahath
and Jahath fathered Ahumai and Lahad
These were the clans of the Zorathites
